remarks: Lemma 4 for ~ frgrancvvdeq .  The restricted iota of a vertex is the intersection of the corresponding neighborhoods.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 18-Dec-2017.)
statement:
frgrancvvdeq.nx $e |- D = ( <. V , E >. Neighbors X ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.ny $e |- N = ( <. V , E >. Neighbors Y ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.ne $e |- ( ph -> X =/= Y ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.xy $e |- ( ph -> Y e/ D ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.f $e |- ( ph -> V FriendGrph E ) $.
frgrancvvdeq.a $e |- A = ( x e. D |-> ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) ) $.
frgrancvvdeqlem4 $p |- ( ( ph /\ x e. D ) -> { ( iota_ y e. N { x , y } e. ran E ) } = ( ( <. V , E >. Neighbors x ) i^i N ) ) $.
